doctor.name: Dr. Anita Shyam
doctor.title: Our Sexologist Doctor in India
doctor.description: Dr. Anita has a versatile approach as a licensed sex and intimacy coach, clinical sexologist, holistic psychiatrist and an energy healing practitioner. She is also widely known for her nationally television conversation about sexual health, her free educational camps for sex education and free counselling and sex education for teens and young adults. Numerous publications and medical books editing also take her side. She has pursued her MBBS and MD from University of Mumbai and is currently practicing from USA and provides online consultation.
